TIKO_PROPERTY_ID.name: tiko property ID
TIKO_PROPERTY_ID.description: The ID of the property you want to monitor. You can find the properties IDs in the startup log of the add-on. If not set, the add-on will monitor the first property.

TIKO_BYPASS_SCHEDULE.name: Bypass tiko schedule
TIKO_BYPASS_SCHEDULE.description: Enabling this option will bypass the server-side tiko schedule, effectively deleting all the schedules set on the tiko app.

MQTT_BROKER_URL.name: MQTT broker URL
MQTT_BROKER_URL.description: The URL of the MQTT broker. If not set, the add-on will use the MQTT add-on service.

MQTT_USERNAME.name: MQTT username
MQTT_USERNAME.description: The MQTT username. If MQTT broker URL is not set, the add-on will use the MQTT add-on service.

MQTT_PASSWORD.name: MQTT password
MQTT_PASSWORD.description: The MQTT password. If MQTT broker URL is not set, the add-on will use the MQTT add-on service.
